location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Patrick Ryan, Poona [Puna] to Colonel Lewis Pelly

mods.abstract: Letter regarding Pelly's report on his journey to Riyadh which is now with the printers and the Governor of Bombay's desire that references to William Gifford Palgrave's journey be expunged from the report.The letter also refers to the life-like pictures and interview with the ruler of Najd (Amir Faisul ibn Turki al Sa'ud).
